summary: Water quality is stable but temperature is slightly lower than average, which may affect fish growth and plant health.

insights.recommendation: Maintain current pH levels; they are within the optimal range for both tilapia and plants.
TDS levels are acceptable; monitor for any significant changes.
Consider increasing water temperature to around 27-28°C for optimal growth.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.04 / 7.016 / 7.088 (trend: up)
• TDS avg/min/max: 312.96 / 295.1 / 347.6 ppm (trend: down)
• Temp avg/min/max: 27.216 / 24.19 / 30.44 °C (trend: down)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
